title: VD: a new focus
creator_credit: Noel Nosseck, American Educational Films and Directions Unlimited Film Corporation
brief_description: Traces the history of venereal diseases, points out the reasons why there is no vaccine for treatment and lists the symptoms of venereal disease. Emphasises the case and importance of cure in the early stages. Exposes myths surrounding venereal diseases.
